alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 14 at 1:08PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...POTENT WINTER STORM CONTINUES... .A strong winter storm will continue to impact the region through tonight. Additional snow amounts will generally be highest across the northern Black Hills area, and southwest through south central South Dakota. Strong northwest winds gusting 35 to 50 mph at times on the South Dakota plains will continue to support blizzard or near blizzard conditions at times. Listen to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for the latest updates on this storm. ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Oglala Lakota County, Jackson County, Bennett County, Mellette County, Todd County and Tripp County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will produce blizzard to near blizzard conditions at times.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Oglala Lakota; Todd; Tripp
